post:
Hello,
We've got a new KVM node in Frankfurt, Germany and well here's our offer, also do note, these will be provisioned only on our *NEW* Frankfurt Node !

All the Frankfurt, Germany VPS's come with,
100 Mbit/sec shared line
Dedicated RAM 
4 Shared Cores
1 Static IPv4
SolusVM

KVM Plan Details :
256 MB Guaranteed RAM
2 GB HDD
200 GB Bandwidth at 100 Mbit/sec 
SolusVM Control Panel
4 Shared Cores
1 IPv4
$15/Year

Order Link :
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=42

Test IP : 84.200.84.197
Location : Frankfurt, Germany
IPv6 Info : DC has it, we have it, we'll be deploying it soon.
Terms And Conditions and Acceptable User Policy of our VPS Hosting Service : http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php?id=vps_tos

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

Live chat : http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=CrownCloud&uio=d4

All orders are manually processed and may take upto 12 hours for activation, Please use a valid email when signing up as the details of the VPS will be emailed to you, 

Supported OS for KVM,
Any OS, provide us the link to the ISO and we'll make it available for you to install, note for windows you'll have to provide your own ISO and license key to it.

Contact us at support@crowncloud.net if you need any pre-sales info or support.
or join us on IRC at #CrownCloud on FreeNode !

Live chat : http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=CrownCloud&uio=d4

Thanks !
